cancelPolicy.en: If cancellation are made 15 days before the date of travel then 50.0% of deposit will be charged as cancellation fees
If cancellation are made 7 days to 15 days before the date of travel then 75.0% of deposit will be charged as cancellation fees

bookingPolicy.en: The customer receives the payment confirmation receipt via email within 15 minutes of successful booking.
The confirmation voucher will be released via email in less than 48 hours after customers making deposit.

refundPolicy.en: 100.0% of total tour cost will have to be paid 0 days before the date of travel.

childrenPolicy.en: You should pay a deposit of 100$ to confirm the booking

content.vi: After an exciting day, return to your hotel for a restful overnight stay, sweet dreams to you.

content.vi: Arrive back at the original meeting point, where your tour ends. Thank you for joining us, and we hope to see you again on another adventure!
content.en: Arrive back at the original meeting point, where your tour ends. Thank you for joining us, and we hope to see you again on another adventure!

content.vi: Arrive at the stunning historical landmark. Take a guided tour, where you'll learn about its rich history and significance. Don't forget to capture breathtaking photos! Next, we’ll head to a vibrant local market. Stroll through stalls filled with handmade crafts and local delicacies. Sample traditional snacks and pick up unique souvenirs. Enjoy a delicious lunch at a nearby restaurant, featuring authentic cuisine. This is a perfect opportunity to mingle with fellow travelers and share experiences.
content.en: Arrive at the stunning historical landmark. Take a guided tour, where you'll learn about its rich history and significance. Don't forget to capture breathtaking photos! Next, we’ll head to a vibrant local market. Stroll through stalls filled with handmade crafts and local delicacies. Sample traditional snacks and pick up unique souvenirs. Enjoy a delicious lunch at a nearby restaurant, featuring authentic cuisine. This is a perfect opportunity to mingle with fellow travelers and share experiences.
